forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy. Low around 59, with temperatures rising to around 61 overnight. South wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

weather_report:
As the city, shrouded in a whisper of drizzle, drifts through the autumn night, a soft blanket of clouds hovers above, casting a gentle gloom. The air, steeped in the cool embrace of the bay, rests around 59 degrees—a soothing balm that speaks of the higher temps to come. A delicate southern breeze, gentle yet persistent, stirs the hair and rustles the leaves, foreshadowing a day that promises a sprinkle of sunshine after the morning's possibility of mist.

Thursday will unveil itself, likely teetering between the remnants of gray and the anticipation of blue. By late morning, the charming drizzles may give way to the sun, painting a canvas of warmth across the urban landscape, nudging temperatures toward a pleasant 68. As the afternoon progresses, a slight retreat into the cooler embrace of 65 may feel both refreshing and invigorating. Wrap yourself in layers; a light jacket will harmonize with the shifting moods of the weather, offering comfort against sudden gusts. In this setting, a leisurely walk down the Embarcadero, a warm beverage in hand, might reveal the unnoticed flair of the city, while the careful observer lingers over the delicate interplay of light and shadow across the skyline.
